dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev was just at that new wholesale distribution center in Aktau.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Tokayev was just at that new wholesale distribution center in Aktau.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev visited a wholesale distribution center in Aktau during his working trip to the Mangystau region, citing the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, the one in the Mangystau region. It's the first facility like that there, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, the one in the Mangystau region. It's the first facility like that there, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Head of State, this is the first facility of its kind built in the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they're saying it's huge—like, 80,000 square meters, with a storage capacity of 40,000 tons.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they're saying it's huge-like, eighty thousand square meters, with a storage capacity of forty thousand tons.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the information, the complex covers an area of 80,000 square meters and has a storage capacity of 40,000 tons.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's massive. And the goal is to cut down on food prices by reducing middlemen, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's massive. And the goal is to cut down on food prices by reducing middlemen, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "It is expected to play a key role in ensuring food security, reducing the number of intermediaries, and lowering food prices," the Akorda press service said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They're hoping it'll really boost food security in the area.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They're hoping it'll really boost food security in the area.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "It is expected to play a key role in ensuring food security, reducing the number of intermediaries, and lowering food prices," the Akorda press service said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: How much did it cost to build?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: How much did it cost to build?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, around 5 billion tenge in investments went into this first phase.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, around five billion tenge in investments went into this first phase.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "5 billion tenge in investments were attracted for the implementation of the project.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're already planning a second phase?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're already planning a second phase?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, by the end of the year, apparently. They're also working on contracts with domestic suppliers now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, by the end of the year, apparently. They're also working on contracts with domestic suppliers now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The launch of the second phase is planned by the end of the year," the statement said. It is noted that active work is currently underway to sign contracts with major domestic suppliers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Smart move—keeping things local could help stabilize supply chains.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Smart move-keeping things local could help stabilize supply chains.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And with Tokayev visiting, it shows how seriously they're taking this project.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And with Tokayev visiting, it shows how seriously they're taking this project.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Infrastructure like that can make a real difference for regional economies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Infrastructure like that can make a real difference for regional economies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Especially in a place like Mangystau, where logistics might've been a challenge before.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Especially in a place like Mangystau, where logistics might've been a challenge before.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, reducing those intermediaries could mean fresher, cheaper produce for people there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, reducing those intermediaries could mean fresher, cheaper produce for people there.
